name: Spot Spot X 2-Way Satellite Messenger
description: Send texts and emails to anyone, anywhere, regardless of how many bars your phone has. The SPOT X allows 2-way messaging when you are off the grid. . With a dedicated SOS button, you can quickly and easily call for help and local first responders will be dispatched to your location. Requires a pay subscription service and a clear view of the sky to work.2-way texting and emailing from nearly anywhere on earth.Direct communication between SPOT X devices.SOS messaging sends rescuers your exact GPS location.Confirmation from rescue centre lets you know help is on the way and allows texting with rescue personnel.SOS messages are received by GEOS, a worldwide emergency response center with 24/7/365 staffing.SOS button with hard-plastic cover prevents accidental activation.Satellite coverage works around the world, including continental US, Canada and Mexico, (for coverage see SPOT’s website).Store up to 14 predefined messages.Check-in feature send pre-programmed message and GPS location via email or SMS to up to 10 pre-determined contacts.Track progress with location updates on cloud-based mapping, at  5, 10, 30 or 60 minutes to maximize battery life. Extreme tracking sends updates every 2½ minutes.2 subscription plans for year-round use, or flex plans for seasonal/month-to-month use.Free SPOT X mobile app allows pairs via Bluetooth.Electronic compass and programable waypoints.Rechargeable internal battery pack delivers up to 240 hours with 10-minute logging.Illuminated keyboard.High contrast screen is backlit and easy to read in all conditions.IPX7 waterproofing protects from downpours.In the box: Spot X, carabiner and strap, USB cable, SOS sticker, kickstand and documentation.
